title: Omega Teemo Release Date?
body: Just curious on when Omega Squad Teemo is going to release. I've got money to throw at you, Riot! :D

replies.body: I asked Riot to hold off while I work on my Jax top lane to ensure I crush all the Teemo's.  As soon as I feel I'm playing solidly enough, they'll release him.

> [{quoted}](name=Arliden,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GAeQEZTY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-09T14:33:26.806+0000)
>
> I asked Riot to hold off while I work on my Jax top lane to ensure I crush all the Teemo's.  As soon as I feel I'm playing solidly enough, they'll release him.

I'd consider playing an ability-focused champion. Jax is fairly AA-reliant, so he might not be the smartest choice against Teemo. I'd say Maokai, Sion, maybe even Gnar (engage while Mega, not Mini).

Idk, I'm not an expert.
Yorick man, you cannot lose that lane you have sustain poke out trade him and your w pops shrooms if you see him place them. One of the easiest counters in the game.

> [{quoted}](name=HVGHighVelocity,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GAeQEZTY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-09T15:23:15.058+0000)
>
> I'd consider playing an ability-focused champion. Jax is fairly AA-reliant, so he might not be the smartest choice against Teemo. I'd say Maokai, Sion, maybe even Gnar (engage while Mega, not Mini).
> 
> Idk, I'm not an expert.

I do well against most teemo's as Gnar but you need to play smart. He will out trade you if you don't engage properly, and you need to basically go agro every time you're mega unless it's a very bad idea.
Also purchased a Paysafe yesterday ... still waiting -_- Pls Rito release this
